title: Kender
entryLore: Kender are small humanoids native to the world of Krynn, known for their insatiable curiosity, fearlessness, and tendency to 'find' things that belong to others. They are not truly thievesâ€”they simply have a different understanding of personal property and often forget how items came to be in their pouches. Kender are immune to fear and often charge headlong into danger without a second thought, much to the consternation of their companions. Their boundless optimism and cheerful demeanor can be both endearing and exasperating.

traits.name: Fearless
traits.description: You have [[advantage]] on saving throws you make to avoid or end the [[frightened]] condition on yourself. When you fail such a saving throw, you can choose to succeed instead. Once you succeed on a saving throw in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].

traits.name: Kender Curiosity
traits.description: You gain proficiency with one of the following skills of your choice: [[insight|Insight]], [[investigation|Investigation]], [[sleight_of_hand|Sleight of Hand]], [[stealth|Stealth]], or [[survival|Survival]].

traits.name: Taunt
traits.description: As a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]], you can unleash a string of provoking words at a creature within 60 feet of you that can hear and understand you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw, or it has [[disadvantage]] on attack rolls against targets other than you until the start of your next turn. The DC equals 8 + your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]] + your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier (choose when you select this race). You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].
